steps.name: Search product with keyword "ZARA COAT 3" for checkout flow
Click view product for checkout flow
Verify product name, to make sure the product "ZARA COAT 3" is shown for checkout flow
Click ATC button for checkout flow
Click checkout button for checkout flow
Enter the details payment for checkout flow
Click place order button for checkout flow
Verify order, to make sure "ZARA COAT 3" successfully ordered
